description: Change the way you pay us and all future monthly payments will be taken using your new payment method.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Change the way you pay us and all future monthly payments will be taken using your new payment method."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
If you are not the bank/building society account holder, or more than one person is required to authorise debits from this account, you will not be able to authorise a Direct Debit mandate online.
All correspondence regarding this Direct Debit mandate will be sent using the preferred contact details on your London Road User Charging account.
I confirm that I am the bank/building society account holder, and/or I have the sole responsibility for authorising debits from this account.
